title: Pancakes with Maple Syrup
summary: Fluffy pancakes served with butter and sweet maple syrup, perfect for breakfast.
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Whisk eggs, milk, and melted butter together.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
Heat a pan and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until golden brown on both sides.
Serve warm with butter and maple syrup.

title: Grilled Salmon
summary: Tender salmon fillet grilled to perfection with lemon and herbs.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Brush salmon with olive oil and season with garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Place lemon slices on top of salmon.
Grill salmon for 4–5 minutes per side until cooked through.
Garnish with parsley and serve hot.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A colorful mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and garlic.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok or large pan.
Add garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add broccoli, bell pepper, carrot, and zucchini.
Stir-fry vegetables for 5–7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and toss to coat evenly.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate frosting.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
Add milk, oil, and vanilla extract; mix until smooth.
Pour batter into a greased cake pan.
Bake for 30–35 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
Cool and spread chocolate frosting on top before serving.
